function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced sound levels may lead to uncomfortable ambiance","Impact":"Anxious consumers may be less relaxed and comfortable while shopping","Mitigation":"Adjust sound levels to create a relaxing but not uncomfortable ambiance","Technologies":"Sound management systems, background music","People":"Shoppers","Owner":"Store management"},{"Description":"Masks and sanitizers may affect ambient conditions","Impact":"Shoppers may be less able to enjoy ambient conditions and scents","Mitigation":"Ensure proper ventilation, use ambient scent control systems","Technologies":"Scent control systems, air purifiers","People":"Shoppers","Owner":"Store management"},{"Description":"Contamination risk from VR equipment","Impact":"Risk of contamination from shared VR equipment if not properly disinfected","Mitigation":"Implement regular and thorough disinfection protocols for VR equipment","Technologies":"UV-C sanitization, disposable VR covers","People":"Shoppers, store employees","Owner":"Store management"}]}
